title: milk jug
description: i drank some milk for the first time and didn't like it so i threw the jug away

comments.content: That's a waste, you can empty+rinse it out and then recycle!

title: Nasty Fruit
description: These dropped off my neighbor's tree so I threw them in the trash. That's cool right?

comments.content: dude ew. but yea those can go in the garbage if you don't have a compost/yard waste bin.

description: I always throw these in the recycling but someone told me I shouldn't! What do I do with these?

comments.content: your friend was right, that kind of yogurt sticks to the inside and makes recycling hard. unless you scour the inside with a brush, just toss it.
